tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very happy with doctor friendliness, patience and explanation of health issue.
She carefully license to our problems and gives best treatment, doesn't suggest unnecessary blood tests and tablet.
Anyone can visit Dr.Sushma for pregnancy related treatment without any hesitation.
Very much satisfied with the service.
reply_text: Thank you for the valuable feedback.

review: Dr.Sushma Shet is very friendly and explains everything in detail. She never prescribe unnecessary medication or tests. She will respond for the calls or messages all the time.. thanks a ton ma'am for all your guidance.. I would recommend this doctor..
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
****** *** *** **** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** Her warmth and friendliness strikes the correct chord with the patients. We made constant visits since the pregnancy checks till after the delivery. She gave all advises and we adhered to those. She is very soft-spoken and easily communicable.
It was a nice experience and I would recommend a visit for any Gynec checks to her.
reply_text: Thank you very much for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I am really happy and satisfied with Dr Sushma Shet 
to get the consultation for my wife pregnancy checkup. Her guidance and support was really helpful in this  COVID-19 situation.I strongly recommend to all the couples who are planning to become Mom and Dad to get consultation from Dr Sushma Shet who has 15+ years of experience.

Regards, Vinayak S
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback

review:
****** ** ****** *** guided us well through my wife’s pregnancy. She is very courteous and helpful. Doctor was available all the time during any emergency and supported us with her expertise. I would definitely recommend the doctor to everyone and we are sure that you will be helped in all best ways possible. 
Thank you doctor for all the support.
reply_text: Thank you very much for the appreciation..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would recommend the doctor to anyone who is looking out for a **** gynaecologist. I received very good feedback regarding this doctor due to which I had travelled all the way from electronic city for her consultation, and I must say I am very satisfied with the consultation. She is indeed very polite and friendly. I really appreciate that she takes time out to explain the underlying health issues and addressess other concerns of the patient before suggesting a suitable medication.
reply_text: Thanks a lot for your appreciation.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I have known Dr Sushma for 5 years now. One of the very good gynaecologists I have known. She has been an  essential part of my completed pregnancy. Right from giving you the right advice to right kind of diagnosis you can get it all from the Dr. Friendly and humble enough to explain  the smallest concern you have. 
Thanks for everything Dr. Sushma you have been a great support!!!!
reply_text: Thank you for the loving feedback.

review: I am a Doctor myself .I had unexplained weight gain and irregular periods. I was diagnosed to have hypothyroidism .Was put on medicines .Now my periods are regular with thyroid profile in normal range. She is always available .Inspite of her busy schedule she manages to reply back .I would recommend her to everyone .
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback.
